attributes.action: Make the SL3 Thamesmead and Bromley North stop at Townley Grammar School
attributes.additional_details: A new SL3 stop at the Townley Grammar school stop (where the 269 stops) would significantly improve safety and accessibility for hundreds of students who currently face long walks from existing stops, often in bad weather or dark conditions. It would also reduce traffic congestion around the school gates by encouraging more public transport use, benefiting the whole community.
attributes.background: We want Transport for London (TfL) to add a bus stop for the SL3 express bus service directly outside or very close to Townley Grammar in Bexleyheath. This stop would serve students, staff, and local residents.

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level.
